todolist.ui.controllers

Class MainViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • todolist.ui.controllers.MainViewController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArchiveController, OverdueController, SettingsController, TodayController, WeekController

    public class MainViewController
extends Object
    MainViewController controls and manipulates data for display on the main display area, for the main tab.
    Author:
    Huang Lie Jun (A0123994W)
    See Also:
    MainViewController

      setPageIndex takes in the tab index and sets the page with the index as the current page.

      setPlaceHolder takes in a glyphSource directory and sets the glyph as the placeholder for empty list view(s).

      setTasks takes a list of tasks and sets it as the list of tasks to display by associating with the list view.

      • setTasks

        public void setTasks(ArrayList<Task> tasks)
        setTasks takes a list of tasks and sets it as the list of tasks to display by associating with the list view. This overrides all the tasks in the current list of display tasks.
        Parameters:
        ArrayList - tasks is the list of tasks to replace the current display list

      • highlight

        public void highlight(Task task)
        highlight gets the index of the task to highlight and put that index item on focus.
        Parameters:
        Task - task is the task to be highlighted.
